title: Battery and Power Problems - Battery drain, phone won't restart, power surge, etc.
content:
I'm having several power related issue on my new (less than 2 months old) Pixel 3. Here's what is happening
Battery life is plummeting -- phone won't even last 12 hours now with ordinary usage
I noticed the phone is running very warm for no particular reason
Phone will not turn on if disconnected from power, regardless of power level when it turned off. If you go to charge it, it displays the dead battery icon
Phone will not charge through the wall adapter that came with the Pixel. However, the adapter works because I can use it with over devices still
When I pluck the phone into my laptop through a USB it will charge, but I get  "power surge" warning saying the phone is drawing more power than a USB port can supply

Everything is up to date, and no apps seems to be using an unusual amount of power. I'm wondering if this could be a circuitry issue that needs a hardware fix?
